name: Sinthetic - pre_alpha
description:
Sinthetic is an Action RPG that also incorporates visual novel elements. Taking influences from both Western and Japanese cyberpunk media, the game seeks to implement elements both visual and narrative into a balance of East and West.

  • WASD - Move
  • ESC - Menu/Exit Menu
  • SHIFT - Sprint
  • SPACE - Interact/Advance Dialogue
Combat
  • LMB - Attack
  • RMB - Heavy Attack (Fawke) / Reload (Astrid)
  • Q - Ability 1
  • E - Ability 2
  • X - Ability 3
  • R - Ability 4 (Not in yet)
  • 1 - Swap to team member 1
  • 2 - Swap to team member 2
  • SHIFT - Dash
  • Programmer, Designer, Sprite Artist -  Tony Nguyen
  • Concept Artist, Illustrator - Amy Wu
  • QA - Janifer Lai

Please report any bugs you encounter and enjoy.
